General.Name: Sichuan Troy Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Troy Information Technology Co., Ltd. operates as an information technology (IT) service provider primarily in China. It offers big data products, such as enterprise-level big data platform, big data business model platform, big data processing platform, and big data capability sharing platform; and cloud computing application platform, comprising data virtualization machine, database full stack super fusion system, data protection recovery integration devices, cloud application security protection system, and cloud distribution block storage system, as well as cloud management platform and other cloud products. The company also provides platform for IoT systems and capabilities, which includes IoT access, protocol parsing, data storage, data analysis, and application enablement. Its products are used in public safety, public services, energy, and communication industries. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Troy Technology Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Troy Information Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2008. Troy Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
